title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When trying to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the selection is not being registered.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.

Observed Behavior: The label item cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Expected Behavior: The label item should be selectable on the first attempt.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
OB: The label item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
EB: The label item should be selectable on the first attempt.
SR:
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
